dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- GLAA
dmca.body:
P.O. Box 75265
Washington, D.C. 20013
202-667-5139

GLAA
GAY AND LESBIAN ACTIVISTS ALLIANCE

equal@glaa.org
www.glaa.org
Fighting for equal rights since 1971

October 25, 2006

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Sent via: fax to 650-963-3255

RE: DMCA Take Down Notice

Dear Sir or Madam:

I am the Vice President of the Gay and Lesbian Activists Alliance of Washington, Inc. 

(GLAA), which is the owner of the copyrighted picture of our former president Bob 

Summersgill, currently found on the Washington Blade newspaper site by agreement with 

GLAA. The picture is at 

http://www.washblade.com/2003/8-29/news/localnews/summersgill.jpg on the webpage 

http://www.washblade.com/2003/8-29/news/localnews/haacant.cfm.

We recently learned of the existence of a blog website owned by Google, 

http://fagboys.blogspot.com/. This blog is publishing the copyrighted picture at 
http://fagboys.blogspot.com/2006_10_01_archive.html#8926100635012581086.

This letter serves as GLAA
